name: MsixPackaging
description: Build and package Windows apps using the MSIX package format
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: outputPath
inputs.label: Output Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the generated package or bundle.

inputs.name: buildSolution
inputs.label: Build Solution with MSBuild
inputs.helpMarkDown: Invoke MSBuild and build the solution from scratch.  If this is selected, you must provide a path to the solution file to build and select the target platforms to build.

inputs.name: inputDirectory
inputs.label: Input Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to the directory with the files to be packaged.

inputs.name: solution
inputs.label: Project to Build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root of the project or solution to build.  Wildcards can be used.

inputs.name: clean
inputs.label: Clean Before Building
inputs.helpMarkDown: Run a clean build (/t:clean) prior to the build.

inputs.name: buildConfiguration
inputs.label: Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: The configuration to build the solution with. Only one configuration is supported at a time.

inputs.name: buildPlatform
inputs.label: Platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the platform you want to build such as Win32, x86, x64 or any cpu.

inputs.name: buildForX86
inputs.label: Build for x86
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build the solution for the x86 platform.

inputs.name: buildForX64
inputs.label: Build for x64
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build the solution for the x64 platform.

inputs.name: buildForArm
inputs.label: Build for ARM
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build the solution for the ARM platform.

inputs.name: buildForAnyCpu
inputs.label: Build for Any CPU
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build the solution for the Any CPU platform.

inputs.name: updateAppVersion
inputs.label: Update App Version in Manifest
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the app version from the one in the manifest.

inputs.name: manifestFile
inputs.label: Manifest File to Update Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the manifest file.  This is only used to update the app version.

inputs.name: appVersion
inputs.label: App Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version number to set for the app.

inputs.name: appPackageDistributionMode
inputs.label: Application Package Distribution Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to generate the .msixupload file for Store upload, the .msix/.msixbundle for non-Store apps, or both.

options.SideloadOnly: Create an application package (.msix) or bundle (.msixbundle) for non-Store app
options.StoreOnly: Create an application package upload file (.msixupload) for Store app

inputs.name: msbuildVersion
inputs.label: MSBuild Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the preferred version cannot be found, the latest version found will be used instead.

inputs.name: msbuildArchitecture
inputs.label: MSBuild Architecture
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the architecture (x86, x64) of MSBuild to run.

inputs.name: msbuildLocation
inputs.label: Path to MSBuild
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the path to MSBuild.
